Class FlagDO

java.lang.Object
application.FlagDO
public class FlagDO extends Object
The FlagDO class manages CRUD operations for Flag objects in the database. It includes support for creating, reading, updating, and deleting flags on questions, answers, and private feedback.

      Parameters:
